settings_handle_description: Handle must be unique and can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores.
settings_display_name_description: Display name must be between 3-20 characters.
settings_language_description: Choose your preferred language for the interface.
oauth_please_wait: Please wait while we sign you in
settings_bio_description: Write a short bio about yourself. Maximum 200 characters.

validation_handle_min_length: Handle must be at least 3 characters
validation_handle_invalid_format: Handle can only contain letters, numbers, and underscores
validation_name_min_length: Display name must be at least 3 characters
validation_bio_max_length: Bio must be 200 characters or less
validation_location_max_length: Location must be 30 characters or less
validation_website_max_length: Website must be 50 characters or less
site_title_description: Mofumofu - A soft and simple blogging platform for everyone.
search_welcome_description: You can search by title, content, hashtags, and author
write_page_description: Write and share new posts with others on Mofu.

auth_password_requirements: Must include at least 8 characters with uppercase, lowercase, numbers, and special characters
oauth_github_error: An error occurred while proceeding with GitHub login
oauth_google_error: An error occurred while proceeding with Google login
settings_notifications_new_posts_desc: Get notified when people you follow publish new posts
settings_privacy_profile_desc: Control who can see your profile and posts

oauth_handle_unavailable: This handle is already in use

post_validation_slug_format: Slug cannot contain spaces or special characters that cannot be used in URLs.

post_delete_error: Failed to delete post. Please try again.

profile_try_different_tags: Try selecting different tags or clear filters.
